Mindtree Ltd.

Big Data Support Engineer

November 2019 -- Present

Job Requirements and Responsibilities

Big Data support engineer with Microsoft Azure Data Factory and Azure Stream Analytics.

  • Azure Data Factory : Microsoft's hybrid cloud data integration service that simplifies ETL at scale. We work with 90+ database connectors, data transformation activities, networking and security, and major Azure fundementals.
  • Azure Stream Analytics: Real-time analytics service that is designed for mission-critical workloads. As opposed to Data Factory, Stream Analytics is used for live data. Source dataset would be an IOT device or eventhub, as opposed to a databse with set data.
  • Microsoft customer's use this tool. If they have any issues/errors, my job is to fix it. I work with customer support tickets raised with Azure support, to debug and fix Data Factory and Stream Analytics errors.
  • Support cases range from 1 to 40+ days. Requires working with customer's team while collaborating between several internal service teams (network team, SQL db team…), and the azure product groups.
  • I work with critical situation premier severity A cases with large business impacts and high stress environments until the issue is resolved.

Achievements

  • Mindtree CSS Customer Hero Award - June 2020

Free-Lance Web Development

April 2021 - Present

I'm looking for opportunities to build portfolio websites for local artists -- Photographers, Models, Tattoo-Artists, and anyone who's interested!

I can build the end-to-end website, everything you need to get fully set up! Your website can be hosted online for free via Github pages. The only monthly fee would be for your GoDaddy website Domain name.

Check out the professional photography portfolio website that I created!: https://paulobigornia.co

Cost: I'll charge a flat fee -- with an hourly rate for additional requests. To make costs cheapest, we can use a website template (to base the design on) to cut down on hours. Contact me for more information.


Are you interested in a website of your own? Please reach out!

Coding Dojo

Full-Stack Web Developer

April 2019 -- July 2019

3 Technology Stacks

  • M.E.A.N Stack: MongoDB, ExpressJS, Angular, Node.
  • C# Stack: ASP.NET, Entity Framework and SQL.
  • Python Stack: Django/Flask and MySQL.

To pass each stack exam: Required to build a fully functional CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) website application in the above technologies, in a 5 hour time limit with a series of requirements.

We learned three different full stack packages, to get a better understanding of how the same concepts carry between different languages. My favorite Stack by far is M.E.A.N stack, due to the powerful technology of Angular -- I've built most of my side projects using this.

Applications built

  • RESTful Api, Login and Registration, Messaging and Blogging

About Me

My Online Resume

BIO

Dedicated and motivated professional, combined with a tenacious work ethic and intense curiosity. I am eager to be a part of the exciting journey into the future of tech, and am curious to see the ways I am able to contribute to the world. My goal is to attain a position which will provide an opportunity for growth and personal development, as well as the opportunity to expand my knowledge. I am a graduate of a highly respected web development boot camp in Seattle (Coding Dojo), and am currently happily employed as a Microsoft Big Data Support Engineer via Mindtree Ltd. I am always open to hear about opportunities that align with my goals, please see below for more information about me.
